quiz.text: This initiative was undertaken to sustain JanAndolans for improved nutritional outcomes during 6th RashtriyaPoshanMaah2023. As part of it outreach programs, identification drives, camps, and home visits occur at community levels to spread awareness about holistic nutrition through Anganwadi Centres (AWCs). It is-
options: Poshan Gram 2.0 initiative
Poshan Block 2.0 Programme
Poshan Gram initiative
Poshan Panchayat initiative
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is correct with respect to Kashi Sansad Sanskritik Mahotsav 2023 held recently (Sep 2023)?A) Prime Minister inaugurated 16 Atal Awasiya Vidyalayas.B) Atal Awasiya Vidyalayas are residential schools intend to eventually accommodate 2,000 students each.C) Kashi Saansad Tourist Guide portal launched.
options: A and B only
A and C only
B and C only
A only
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to ‘Amazon Future Engineer Programme’?
options: National Education Society for Tribal Students (NESTS) recently launched the Phase II of the ‘Amazon Future Engineer Programme’
Pilot Phase I was launched in Dec 2022.
This year it is planned to be implemented in 54 Eklavya Model Residential Schools (EMRS) across 6 states.
It is a Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) program to develop interest of students in exploring higher education and career in computer science.
None of the above

quiz.text: ‘CRIIIO 4 GOOD’ seen in the news recently (Sep 2023), it is related to which of the following?
options: Space mission launched by SpaceX to explore Martian atmosphere.
Life skills learning module to promote gender parity.
AI tool developed to explore the current issue of Child Care in Practice.
Chat- Bot launched by Ministry of Roads, Highways and Transportation
Portal to share Good Samaritan stories.

quiz.text: The 'Travel for LiFE' program seen in the news recently (Sep 2023) launched by the Ministry of Tourism (MoT) in collaboration with multiple organizations. Which one of the following is not one of them?
options: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC)
The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
World Tourism Organization (UNWTO)
The United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
None of the above

quiz.text: Identify correct statement with respect to Swachhata Special Campaign 3.0 seen in the news recently.A) It is implemented by the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology.B) It is aimed at promoting e-Office work culture.C) Campaign timeline for this year is from 2nd October to 31st October 2023.
options: A and B only
B and C only
A and C only
C only
A only

quiz.text: The Minister of State for Home Affairs recently (Sep 2023) participated in a Ministerial Conference commemorating the 20th anniversary of this United Nations Convention.Identify correct statement with respect to it-A) It was established by the UN General Assembly (UNGA) in 2000 and enforced in 2003.B) This convention is the 1st comprehensive treaty targeting safe movement of Persistent Organic Pollutants.C) India joined in 2002 and ratified it in 2011.
options: A and B only
A and C only
B and C only
All of the above
C only

quiz.text: The UNDP has introduced this initiative to provide foundational understanding and advanced knowledge about sustainable finance and its importance for achieving the SDGs. It comprises 10 Comprehensive Modules covering essential topics related to sustainable finance. The initiative described above is-
options: SDGs Mentorship Programme
SDGs Finance Academy
Global SDGs Alliance
Open Access e-Learning Programme
Open SDG Finance

quiz.text: India and UN launched initiative recently (Sep 2023) with the objective to share India’s development experiences, best practices, and expertise with partner countries in the Global South through capacity building and training programs. Identify correct statement with respect to it-A) The UN India team and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation will collaborate under this initiative.B) The initiative aims to contribute to global efforts toward achieving the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)C) Initiative titled as ‘India-UN for the Global South-Delivering for Development’.
options: A only
B only
C only
A and B only
B and C only

quiz.text: In the month of September Indian government has increased windfall tax on petroleum crude twice. The windfall tax on petroleum crude will be raised to______ per ton from ________, effective Sept. 30.
options: 15,000 rupees & 9,200 rupees
14,300 rupees & 11,100 rupees
9,000 rupees & 8,000 rupees
10,000 rupees & 6,700 rupees
12,100 rupees & 10,000 rupees

quiz.text: The World Health Organization (WHO) has recently launched two resources designed to strengthen suicide prevention efforts. Identify correct statement with respect to it.A) Suicide is fourth leading cause of death among 15–29-year-olds. B) 1st resource is - Preventing suicide: a resource for media professionals (2023 update).C) 2nd one is - WHO Policy Brief on the health aspects of criminalization of suicide and suicide.
options: A only
B only
C only
A and B only
B and C only

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2023) this Central Public Sector Enterprises (CPSE) engaged in promoting, developing and extending financial assistance for setting up new and renewable energy and energy efficiency conservation projects upgraded from ‘Schedule B’ to the ‘Schedule A’ category of CPSE. Identify incorrect statement with respect to it-
options: It is under the administrative control of the Ministry of Power.
It is registered as Non-Banking Financial Institution (NBFC) with RBI.
It is notified as a “Public Financial Institution” under Companies Act, 1956.
‘ENERGY FOR EVER’ is the motto of this CPSE.
Proposal for categorization of the CPSE in a particular Schedule must be supported by financial, physical and qualitative performance figures for the last five years.

quiz.text: Union Minister for Skill Development & Entrepreneurship recently (Sep 2023) launched a state-of-the-art platform to bring all skilling initiatives together. It serves as India’s Digital Public Infrastructure (DPI) for the skill development, education, employment and entrepreneurship ecosystem. Identify its correct features-A) Aadhar-enabled facial recognition technology and eKYC for secure accessB) Digitally Verified Credentials (DVCs)C) Digital CVs through personalised QR Codes D) WhatsApp Chatbot to recommend customized courses
options: B and C only
B, C and D only
A and D only
A, B and D only
All of the above

quiz.text: Identify incorrect statement regarding to the recently released the National e-Governance Service Delivery Assessment (NeSDA) – Way forward Monthly Report for States/UTs.
options: It is the 6th edition of NeSDA – Way forward Monthly Report for States/UTs.
Maximum e-services are in local governance & utility services sector.
Punjab provides the maximum e-services in Labour and Employment Sector.
Anubandham initiative by Gujarat government connects job seekers and job providers.
Jammu and Kashmir, Kerala and Odisha provide 100% of their services through their identified Single Unified Service Delivery Portals.

quiz.text: Identify correct statement regarding to recently launched Capacity Building Plan (CBP) at the headquarters of the Department of Personnel and Training (DoPT).
options: One can undergo apprenticeship training in any establishments in the Central/State Public Sector or Private Sector.
It is launched by National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC).
Around 80% of the skills covered are common and related to functional and behavioural aspects, while the remaining 20% are domain-specific skills.
It provides training modules for Group C and Group D levels of government employees only.
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently 22nd Law Commission of India submitted its reports to the Ministry of Law & Justice. Which of the recommendations are given by this commission?
options: It has asked to reduce the age of consent under the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act from 18 years to 16 years.
Commission recommended to completely abolishing practice of capital punishment for all form of crime.
Recommended to start online FIR for offenses punishable up to 3 years of imprisonment.
For the first time Commission has expressed approval for criminalisation of marital rape.
All of the above

quiz.text: The “South-South Knowledge Sharing Series” event seen in the news recently (Sep 2023) related to which of the following?
options: It was side event of the recently concluded G77+ China Summit.
It was organised by the World Economic Forum.
It deals with the role of development assistance (ODA) flows in climate mitigation and adaptation technologies.
Based on the theme, “Only together can we build a world of shared prosperity”.
This event was cantered on the India’s Digital Public Infrastructure (DPI).

quiz.text: Which of the following program initiated by the Prime Minister of India recently (Sep 2023) to build an understanding of India's G20 Presidency among the youth and enhance their participation in various G20 events?
options: G20 Bharat University Initiative
G20 Youth Engagement Program
G20 University Connect Initiative
G20 Youth Vision Initiative
G20 Youth Empowerment Scheme

quiz.text: Union Minister of Chemicals and Fertilizers recently launched policy dealing with this industry in which India Ranks 3rd globally by volume, with a current market size of USD 50 billion. Also this industry has Potential growth to USD 120-130 billion in the next decade. This policy is-
options: National Policy on Research and Development in Organic Fertilizers.
National Policy on Research and Development and Innovation in Pharma-MedTech Sector in India.
Market Development Assistance policy to promote Organic Fertilizer in India.
National Petrochemicals and Green Chemicals Policy.
None of the above

quiz.text: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) has recently (Sep 2023) introduced a new provision on its portal. Identify correct feature of-A) New provision is launched on Food Licensing and Registration System (FLRS) portal.B) New provision called 'Special Category' promotes pure organic food items.C) Priority will be maintained in such a way that a one-to-one ratio is maintained between 'Special Category' applications and regular applications.
options: A only
B only
C only
A and C only
B and C only

quiz.text: Ministry of Commerce and Industry has recently released updates related to Core sector for the month of August 2023. Which of the following sector experienced a slowdown compared to previous month?
options: Coal
Electricity
Cement
Refinery Products
Fertilizer

quiz.text: The _______ recently released its Monthly Economic Review for August 2023, maintaining a 6.5% real GDP growth estimate for FY24 with symmetric risks.
options: Reserve Bank of India
Union Ministry of Finance
National Statistical Office (NSO)
The International Monetary Fund (IMF)
None of the above
